messages.title: Liberal Democrats put the environment first
messages.content: Liberal Democrat campaigners Cllr Azizur Rahman Khan, Richard Macmillan and Cllr Stephanie Eaton are passionate about making Bethnal Green North cleaner, greener and quieter.

messages.title: Focus on the environment
messages.content: Traffic calming measures are important for our residential roads says Cllr Azizur Rahman Khan and Richard Macmillan. Cllr Stephanie Eaton tests contaminated soil.

messages.title: We deserve better.
messages.content: The polls are clear, Britain has had enough of Labour. Thousands of jobs and businesses have been lost. Families have been hit hard in the pocket. A generation faces a future of debt.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support residents and groups who set up community gardens and allotments.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Make housing associations take action on dog mess
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Make housing associations take action about dog mess.
Oppose tree removals and make sure that there is a net increase in trees and green spaces.
Sensible traffic calming and parking policies.
Make recycling easier and effective - for homes and businesses.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a two horse race - Labour can't win.

issues.economy: The polls are clear, Britain has had enough of Labour. Thousands of jobs and businesses have been lost. Families have been hit hard in the pocket.
issues.environment: Liberal Democrats put the environment first. Focus on the environment. Liberal Democrat campaigners are passionate about making Bethnal Green North cleaner, greener and quieter.

housing.content: Make housing associations take action about dog mess.

leaflet.personalStatement: Ajmal Masroor, the Liberal Democrat parliamentary candidate for Bethnal Green and Bow says: "We deserve better."

contactInformation.address: Printed by Language 3 Gunthorpe Street London E1 7RQ. Published and Promoted by G. Goodlad on behalf of Ajmal Masroor Tower Hamlets Liberal Democrats at all 46 Greatorex Street, London, E1 5NP.
